PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05382021-06-10,  ,  ,  PSPC,  ,  , 
ActFederal Public Sector Labour Relations Act
SubjectNational Capital Commission - Public Service Alliance of Canada ** Collective Agreement **
PrecisOrder authorizing the National Capital Commission (NCC) to ENTER into a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the Public Service Alliance of Canada (PSAC), beginning January 1, 2019 and ending December 31, 2021, that covers all employees in the bargaining unit of the NCC.
AttachmentsAttachment
